create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_EDIT_MAKEUSERLIKE (
@CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @SOURCEUSER uniqueidentifier, @USERLIST xml ) as
set nocount on;
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle updating the data Declare @SELECTEDUSERS table(APPUSERID uniqueidentifier, SELECTED bit)
INSERT INTO @SELECTEDUSERS (APPUSERID, SELECTED) select [USER].value('ID[1]', 'uniqueidentifier') ID, [USER].value( 'SELECTED[1]', 'bit') SELECTED FROM @USERLIST.nodes('//USERLIST/ITEM') as U([USER])
DELETE FROM @SELECTEDUSERS WHERE SELECTED = 0
--- First Remove anything extra
DELETE sraus FROM dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER srau JOIN @SELECTEDUSERS su On su.APPUSERID = srau.APPUSERID JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERSITE sraus ON sraus.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERID = srau.ID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER ssrau On ssrau.SYSTEMROLEID = srau.SYSTEMROLEID AND ssrau.APPUSERID = @SOURCEUSER LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERSITE ssraus On ssraus.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERID = ssrau.ID WHERE ssraus.ID IS NULL
DELETE srau FROM dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER srau JOIN @SELECTEDUSERS su ON su.APPUSERID = srau.APPUSERID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER ssrau ON ssrau.SYSTEMROLEID = srau.SYSTEMROLEID AND ssrau.APPUSERID = @SOURCEUSER WHERE ssrau.ID IS NULL
--- Add anything that doesn't exist INSERT INTO dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER ( SYSTEMROLEID ,APPUSERID ,ADDEDBYID ,CHANGEDBYID ,DATEADDED ,DATECHANGED ,FROMROLESYNC ,SECURITYMODECODE ,CONSTITUENTSECURITYMODECODE ,ACCOUNTINGELEMENTSECURITYMODECODE) SELECT ssrau.SYSTEMROLEID ,su.APPUSERID ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CHANGEAGENTID ,@CURRENTDATE ,@CURRENTDATE ,ssrau.FROMROLESYNC ,ssrau.SECURITYMODECODE ,ssrau.CONSTITUENTSECURITYMODECODE ,ssrau.ACCOUNTINGELEMENTSECURITYMODECODE FROM dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER ssrau CROSS APPLY @SELECTEDUSERS su LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER srau ON srau.SYSTEMROLEID = ssrau.SYSTEMROLEID AND srau.APPUSERID = su.APPUSERID WHERE ssrau.APPUSERID = @SOURCEUSER AND srau.ID IS NULL
INSERT INTO dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERSITE ( SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERID, SITEID, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED ) SELECT dupcheck.ID, ssraus.SITEID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE FROM dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER ssrau JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERSITE ssraus ON ssraus.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERID = ssrau.ID CROSS APPLY @SELECTEDUSERS su JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSER dupcheck ON dupcheck.APPUSERID = su.APPUSERID AND dupcheck.SYSTEMROLEID = ssrau.SYSTEMROLEID LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERSITE dupchecks ON dupchecks.SYSTEMROLEAPPUSERID = dupcheck.SYSTEMROLEID WHERE ssrau.APPUSERID = @SOURCEUSER AND dupchecks.ID IS NULL
end try begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0;
